title: Mahrez
description: Stuck in the French fourth division at 22, it didn’t look as if Riyad Mahrez was going to set the football world alight. But the winger’s speed, trickery and his eye for goal was too impressive to go unnoticed - and a move to the UK set Riyad on a new path… Join him on his mission to make his opportunity count - to shock the world by rewriting the history books and lifting the biggest trophies in the game.
author: Harry Coninx
